snippet.title: Berserk - Play to Earn TCG on Vulcan Forged Ecosystem
snippet.description:
Hey everyone! 
This is a quick overview of the Blockchain game, Berserk. A community-made Trading Card Game by the Vulcan Forged ecosystem.
Find the article: https://egamers.io/berserk-overview-tcg-on-vulcan-forged/
Play Berserk:  https://berserk.vulcanforged.com/
Join Vulcan Forged: https://vulcanforged.com/
Check also the VulcanVerse MMORPG Game: https://egamers.io/vulcanverse-decentralized-mmorpg-with-nft-land-ownership/

#VulcanForge #Berserk #Playtoearn
